template<class T>
class dbArray< T >

Template for arrays

template<class T>
int dbArray< T >::bsearch ( T  value  )  [inline]

Binary search in array Elements of array are assumed to be comparable and are stored in the array in ascending order

Parameters:
value searched value
Returns:
position of the element which is greater or equal than specified (or position beyond the last array element if specified key is grreater than any elment of the array)
